Name: Real-world Multi-Institutional Glioblastoma MRI Dataset with Standardized Preprocessing, Expert-Validated Segmentation, and MGMT Promoter Profiling
EthicsApprovals: The study complied with all relevant regulations and with the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki. Formal ethical committee approval for anonymized data collection and publication was obtained at the University of Foggia and approved by all participating centers (46-CE-2023).
